Recent update makes survivor unplayable. Disappointed greatly as I really enjoyed the game previously.

It's very fun when it's fun and straight up awful when it's bad. I'm glad that I've played it but if stressful games aren't your thing, maybe steer clear of this one. 

Find a good group of people to play with and it'll be a good time, regardless of if you win.

Eu sou um pai de 45 anos, provavelmente uma das pessoas mais velhas a jogar este jogo. Sou pai solteiro criando meu filho, que agora tem 14 anos. Meu filho ganhou este jogo de seu tio, ent√£o o instalamos em seu computador e ele come√ßou a jogar. At√© o final da semana ele tinha 24 horas neste jogo. Isso foi horr√≠vel para mim, pois j√° era dif√≠cil encontrar maneiras de passar o tempo com meu filho, pois ele est√° sempre com os amigos ou apenas assistindo ao YouTube. Ent√£o eu decidi fazer uma conta no Steam e pegar esse jogo para ver se eu poderia jogar ao lado dele. Eu comprei o jogo, escolhi minha skin e mundo e comecei a jogar, mas eu estava preso no que voc√™ deveria fazer. Pedi ajuda ao meu filho e ele organizou um jogo para eu participar. Adorei, pois foi o melhor momento que passei com meu filho desde que minha esposa morreu. Desde ent√£o, esse jogo aproximou eu e meu filho novamente e agora passamos um tempo juntos fora de casa tamb√©m. Este jogo me lembrou que h√° divers√£o em tudo, e trouxe muitas lembran√ßas felizes para mim e meu filho.

At 2:11 AM, December 1st, 2027, your house in Paso Texas will be approached by numerous entities of unknown origin with malicious intent. The knocking is getting louder. You recognize the voices, but something is off about them. They are telling you to let them in. Are you prepared for the situation? If not, then you are already behind, and your chances for survival have drastically decreased. Today, we will discuss how to effectively defend against home invasion. All you need is a 12 gauge shotgun, an M84 flash bang, One bottle of Sweet Baby Rays Barbecue Sauce, and a 20,000 kilogram block of solid Uranium-235. We first must create a diversion. This will distract the assailants so you have an opening for tactical withdrawal. It is for this reason that we brought the barbecue sauce. With your buff, we‚Äôll toned arm, lob the barbecue sauce out the window at exactly 100 m/s and an angle directly parallel to the outside ground. This gives you exactly 1.11 seconds to escape the vicinity before the barbecue sauce lands on the ground and explodes into a lethal fireball as all nearby objects are incinerated by a common household condiment burning at 6,000¬∞ Celsius. A single tear escapes your eye, as you realize, you will probably never taste the sweet nectar of Sweet Baby Rays ever again. Not after the Sigma variant caused the downfall of the barbecue sauce supply chain; a great regime of unwavering glory that surpassed the Roman Empire at its peak. But right now, more important matters are at hand. You will never forget the sacrifice that Sweet Baby Rays made to save your own life, and entrust in your hands the future of human civilization. You must now take action and seek immediate vengeance. Carefully breach your bedroom door with the 12 gauge shotgun and clear the outside area with an M84 flash bang. Then, run towards the nearest exit while making random turns and detours to confuse the enemy; for if you do not know your next move, neither can they. Finally, once you are outside, it is time to unleash the fury of a 20,000 kilogram block of solid subcritical uranium-235. With your house surrounded, it only makes sense that you make one last stand for the survival of human civilization. This is what you have been preparing for. Assuming you have not been lacking, you should easily be able to replicate the compression effects of a chemically fueled assembly nuclear weapon explosive lens with your bare hands to force the fissile uranium into super criticality. Causing an exponential growth of nuclear chain reactions that releases 226,000,000,000 joules of energy into the surrounding environment. But this is not a tragic case of self sacrifice, because you took a swig of Sweet Baby Rays before running out of the house. You will not go gentle into this good night, for souped up on the sweet nectar of God, you are now essentially a human nuclear recoilless gun. No mortal shall oppose you now, for you have ascended to a plane of existence touched by no other living human. Your opponents will not even realize what is happening before a beam of fissile material transfers five hundred kilotons of TNT through their chest, killing them instantly. You are above humanity now. You are a God. The entire world is at your fingertips and you can do anything you want on a whim. I don't normally leave game reviews but since the last update this game has become so toxic. If you wanted to get into/buy this game you should have done it a few months ago when it was actually balanced. i have about 700 hours in this game and, as survivor, i used to escape about 50% of the time, but since the update i have managed to escape twice out of 20-30 matches, only bc i abandoned my remaining teammates. no one wants to play as survivor anymore bc of how killer-sided this game has become, so you just end up waiting 10 minutes to queue for a match, get tunneled, and die. there's no teamwork among survivors anymore bc if you try to rescue anyone you will die. its basically impossible to complete all the gens now. we've been getting about 2-3 done each match. seems like a lot of people are probably going to be abandoning this game for a while, so good luck to anyone who plays bc you will be stuck with all the sweaty killers.

TL;DR: 
Don't waste your time on this game until they fix it.
If you value your sanity, please do not install this game lmao. The recent update has destroyed the game.
I used to love this game but with the new update... I dont anymore. all i have to say is its very killer sided now.

This game is solely balanced around top high rank now. Decisive Strike, Iron Will, Dead Hard, Self Heal nerfes. You now kick gens and destroy pallets faster as killer, more attack speed, faster blood lust, huge Ruin buff, instant 2,5% progress loss for every kick (go Tri-gen). No bonus point perks anymore. Just to name some. Killers were already strong if you played it right (ranged killers exist, pick them and you're good to go), now they nerfed survivors into the ground and buffed killers into nirvana. I don't know who the hell thought this would be a good idea. For real, there is no fun in playing survivor anymore, but if you want to main killer, go for it. Now it's easier than ever before. Good change to the blood rank system and borrowed time though. Matchmaking incentives are a great idea. But that's it. Not going to touch survivor anymore, that's for sure. I don't know why these developers are unable to balance this game. There are flaws on so many levels, I just touched the latest changes because this game is basically unplayable as survivor now, at least if you try to have some fun.

Great job Behaviour! As always! /s

Sadly I wish I could upvote this after playing for so long but now with all the recent updates and nerfing, it‚Äôs not worth playing anymore. 

All the Pros goes to Killers and Cons towards survivors. Yes it is a ‚Äòsurvive‚Äô game but when a killer can just sit and face camp the whole game, it‚Äôs so boring. 

Now with the new update, kills are faster, stronger, perks are better, and they have no penalty to anything. 

As for survivors; abilities have been nurfed, fixing things takes longer, anything and everything we do is against us to the point that It‚Äôs just a boring game now. 

Would recommend if it was balanced or r even slightly tipped killer but now that it‚Äôs pretty much no chance of survivors getting hardly anything, the games just not worth playing.

Pretty sure you're gonna love and hate this game.
good.

Playing as survivor is the most difficult thing ever, your team either fumbles the last generator/Door, or trolls you to be the last one alive. Playing this with the homies was great for a time, but the maps are so stale, and you can only manage to keep your sanity for so long against BBQ&Chilli. Playing as killer is way more fun hands down, being a killer really makes you think about the survivor player you are chasing...
me gusto mucho el juego es muy bueno a la hora de cooperar con los otros supervivientes y el modo asesino es muy bueno
